requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.4 Ghz Dual Core CPU
  • Graphics: 1 GB Dedicated Memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 3.0 Ghz Quad Core CPU or faster
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB Dedicated Memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7 64bit / Win 8 / Win 10
  • Processor: Intel(R)Core i3 2.7GHz
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460/Radeon HD 5800 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: at will
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 7 64bit / Win 8 / Win 10
  • Processor: Intel(R)Core i5 3.2GHz
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960/Radeon HD 7900 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: at will

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL 3.3-Compatible Video Card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: VULKAN API compatible
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL 3.3-Compatible Video Card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: VULKAN API compatible

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista or Windows 7
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or Althon X2 2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI or Nvidia graphics card with 512MB video ram or better and Shader Model 3.0+ support. (ATI Radeon 3870 or higher, Nvidia GeForce 8800 GT or higher)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit: Vista, Win 7, Win 8, Win 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750, 2.67 GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 / AMD Radeon HD 6950 or better with 768 MB+ of VRAM (DirectX 11 Compatible)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Graphics: Geforce 600 and above
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 750 / AMD RX 260
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
